topicTitle: since i have a post about adding de_dolls let remove a map.

posts.postText:
i vote to remove zebra

if you dont have tf2 you cant see the background (tf2 is free btw) 
and its hard to shoot anyone on the tower
 also way too small for 22 people

and its hard to shoot anyone on the tower

The skybox requires Half-Life 2: Episode 2.

oh well in any case not many players have that game

i apologize i was misinformed a that time
